releaseNotes:
NEW:
• Grid (Nettleie): Finally, grid rent is here! View prices and your capacity tier – updated continuously
• Share Address with Co-Habitants: Now you can share read-only access to consumption, costs, and more with those you choose. Perfect for co-residents or families!
• Total Costs: Get a detailed breakdown of your total costs, divided into spot price, electricity contract, grid rent, and electricity subsidy
• Various Under-the-Hood Improvements: Several small adjustments and bug fixes have been implemented
description:
COMPLEX MARKET AND HIGH PRICES
In today’s electricity market, there are over 100 different electricity providers and countless comparison services, apps, and websites that are supposed to “help you.” Electricity contracts are complex and often difficult to understand. In fact, 4 out of 10 people have felt deceived by their electricity company. Moreover, most people do not know their contracts in detail and often pay too much. Data from Elhub and the Consumer Council show that Norwegians overpay for electricity by 3 billion kroner every year, and on average, Norwegians have the 40th best deal. The conclusion is that it is difficult for consumers to navigate and choose the right contract, and most Norwegians overpay!

SLIPPER: YOUR SMART ELECTRICITY ASSISTANT
Slipper is the app that makes it easy and stress-free to always have the best electricity contract. We give you access to your personal consumption and prices and help you navigate the market. We monitor the electricity market 24/7 and find the best deal. All you need to do is approve the switch in the app. Avoid electricity salespeople, comparison portals, dishonest electricity companies, and endless comparisons. We do the work, so you don’t have to!

SAVE TIME AND MONEY
We notify you when a better deal comes along, so you can save time and money. You avoid the stress of navigating and the fear of overpaying for electricity.

PERSONALIZED
Our smart systems analyze your electricity consumption, previous contracts, and important address data to find the best deals specifically for your address and personal consumption. Whether it’s for your home, cabin, or multiple addresses, you get tailored recommendations that save you the most money.

GET FULL CONTROL
• Get an overview of all your addresses
• Track electricity prices and see historical prices
• See where your electricity contract ranks
• Monitor your electricity consumption
• Monitor all electricity contracts 24/7
• Tailored recommendations unique to you
• Switch to the best electricity contract in five seconds with one click

Download Slipper now and experience how easy it is to have control over your electricity!

Privacy policy: https://slipper.no/avtalevilkar/
Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
